hero.tagline: WordPress Plugin Developer • PHP & JavaScript Specialist •

about.title: About Me
introduction: Hi there! I'm Dev Kabir, a WordPress plugin developer with 4+ years of experience. I've built over 150 plugins that help websites work better and automate tasks for users and businesses.
I work with PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, MySQL, and the WordPress ecosystem, and I build WooCommerce integrations and REST APIs. On Fiverr, I've completed 38+ projects with a 5-star rating.

experience.description: Migrated core plugin structure from Vue 2 to Vue 3 (Composition API) across 60K+ lines of code. Contributed to Defender and Beehive plugins and shipped updates via a CI/CD pipeline with peer reviews.
Created a CORS error-solving plugin adopted by 6,000+ websites worldwide and maintained long-term support and documentation for open-source plugins.

Delivered 38+ custom WordPress plugins with 5-star client ratings. Specialized in WooCommerce integrations using REST APIs to connect payment gateways, shipping providers, CRMs, and analytics platforms.

projects.title: CORS Error Solver
projects.description: A WordPress plugin that resolves CORS issues and is used by 6,000+ websites worldwide.

projects.title: Defender Security Plugin
projects.description: Contributed to WPMU DEV's Defender security plugin and shipped feature updates and improvements.

projects.title: Beehive Analytics
projects.description: Worked on the Beehive analytics plugin at WPMU DEV to help users track website performance.

projects.title: WooCommerce Integrations
projects.description: Custom WooCommerce plugins for payment gateways, shipping methods, and inventory management across 38+ client projects.

projects.title: Custom Plugin Suite
projects.description: A collection of 150+ custom WordPress plugins developed for various client needs, from simple utilities to complex systems.

projects.title: CI/CD Automation
projects.description: Shipped updates, bug fixes, and UX improvements in a CI/CD pipeline with peer code reviews.
